episode_summary: In this episode, Scott Salari discusses how Real Sync helps real estate professionals integrate their technology tools to automate processes and improve efficiency. By connecting various apps, agents can reduce manual data entry, ensure consistent follow-ups, and focus more on client relationships. The episode highlights the importance of leveraging technology to streamline operations and enhance customer experiences.
